author: esammer
msg: - Manage source and sink runners as first class citizens (rather than wrapped in logical nodes).
- Wired the JsonFileConfigurationProvider into the node manager so it receives config updates (WORKS).
- JsonFlumeConfiguration renamed to SimpleNodeConfiguration (there was nothing json-ish about it).
- Retroactively made NodeConfiguration the interface for SimpleNodeConfiguration.

author: esammer
msg: - Testing with a logger sink is probably not a good idea. Now we use null.
